title: IE vs. Fx
body: Somehow I missed this <a href="http://www.forbes.com/ebusiness/2004/10/04/cx_pp_1004mondaymatchup.html" title="Monday Matchup: Internet Explorer Vs. Firefox">Monday Matchup on Forbes last week</a>.  They have a little <a href="http://www.forbes.com/technology/2004/10/01/cx_pp_1001matchslide.html?thisSpeed=15000">slideshow dealy</a> in there too.  I'm glad the article exists, because it will make more people aware of Firefox, but it could use a little more detail.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-10-11

IE vs. Fx

Somehow I missed this
